name: IronNet
description: This app provides generic actions for interacting with IronDefense

base_url.description: The base URL for the IronAPI

username.description: The username to use for authentication

password.description: The password to use for authentication

enable_alert_notifications.description: Ingest IronDefense Alert Notifications into Phantom

alert_notification_actions.description: Alert Notification Actions to include for ingest (if ingest is enabled).  Enter in CSV format.

alert_categories.description: Alert Categories to exclude from ingest (if ingest is enabled).  Enter in CSV format.

alert_subcategories.description: Alert SubCategories to exclude from ingest (if ingest is enabled). Enter in CSV format.

alert_severity_lower.description: Minimum Severity of Alerts to ingest (if ingest is enabled)

alert_severity_upper.description: Maximum Severity of Alerts to ingest (if ingest is enabled)

alert_limit.description: Limit of Alert Notifications to ingest at a time (if ingest is enabled)

enable_dome_notifications.description: Ingest IronDefense Dome Notifications into Phantom

dome_categories.description: Dome Categories to exclude from ingest (if ingest is enabled).  Enter in CSV format.

dome_limit.description: Limit of Dome Notifications to ingest at a time (if ingest is enabled)

enable_event_notifications.description: Ingest IronDefense Event Notifications into Phantom

event_notification_actions.description: Event Notification Actions to include for ingest (if ingest is enabled).  Enter in CSV format.

event_categories.description: Event Categories to exclude from ingest (if ingest is enabled).  Enter in CSV format.

event_subcategories.description: Event SubCategories to exclude from ingest (if ingest is enabled). Enter in CSV format.

event_severity_lower.description: Minimum Severity of Events to ingest (if ingest is enabled)

event_severity_upper.description: Maximum Severity of Events to ingest (if ingest is enabled)

event_limit.description: Limit of Event Notifications to ingest at a time (if ingest is enabled)

store_event_notifs_in_alert_containers.description: Store Event Notification in Alert Containers. If selected, Event Notifications will be stored as artifacts in the container of their corresponding Alert (Note that if this option is selected, any Event Notifications prior to the event being associated with the alert will not be ingested). If left unselected, Event Notifications will be stored as artifacts in their own container.

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity using supplied configuration
Provides a rating for an Alert within IronDefense

alert_id.description: The ID of the IronDefense alert

analyst_expectation.description: The analyst expectation for the alert

share_comment_with_irondome.description: Shares the provided comment with IronDome

actions.description: Sets the status of an Alert within IronDefense

alert_id.description: The ID of the IronDefense alert

share_comment_with_irondome.description: Shares the provided comment with IronDome

actions.description: Adds a comment to an Alert within IronDefense

alert_id.description: The ID of the IronDefense alert

share_comment_with_irondome.description: Shares the provided comment with IronDome

actions.description: Reports observed bad activity to IronDefense

name.description: Identifying name of the observed bad activity

description.description: Description of the observed bad activity

domain.description: Domain associated with the observed bad activity

ip.description: IP associated with the observed bad activity

activity_start_time.description: Start time of observed bad activity - in RFC3339 format (https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3339)

activity_end_time.description: End time of observed bad activity - in RFC3339 format (https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3339)

actions.description: Gets community information related to an IronDefense alert

alert_id.description: The ID of the IronDefense alert

actions.description: Retrieves IronDefense Events for a given Alert ID

alert_id.description: The ID of the alert associated with the events to retrieve

actions.description: Ingests Configured Notifications from IronDefense into Phantom

alert_id.description: The IDs of the IronDefense alerts to filter. Enter in CSV format.

category.description: The categories of the IronDefense alerts to filter. Enter in CSV format.

sub_category.description: The subcategories of the IronDefense alerts to filter. Enter in CSV format.

status.description: The statuses of the IronDefense alerts to filter. Enter in CSV format.

min_severity.description: The minimum severity of IronDefense alerts to filter.

max_severity.description: The maximum severity of IronDefense alerts to filter.

actions.description: Retrieves IronDefense Event for a given Event ID

event_id.description: The ID of the event to retrieve
